name: jssm
description: A Javascript finite state machine (FSM) with a terse DSL and a simple API. Well tested, and typed with Flowtype. MIT License.

scripts.test-keepdotcoverage: npm run make && npm run justtest-keep
scripts.test: npm run make && npm run justtest
scripts.justtest: nyc ava src/js/tests/*.js -v && npm run nyc-html
scripts.removedir: rm -rf build && rm -rf dist && rm -rf docs
scripts.createdir: mkdir build && mkdir dist && mkdir docs
scripts.clean: npm run removedir && npm run rmdot && npm run createdir
scripts.make: npm run clean && npm run peg && npm run ts
scripts.peg: rm -f src/js/jssm-dot.js && pegjs src/js/jssm-dot.peg && cp src/js/jssm-dot.js build/
scripts.vet: npm run eslint && npm run audit
scripts.audit: text_audit -t major wasteful any mixed fixme checkme testme stochable todo comeback whargarbl
scripts.build: npm run vet && npm run test && npm run minify && npm run docs && npm run site && npm run dist
scripts.dist: cp build/jssm.*.js dist/ && cp build/jssm.*.js.map dist/
scripts.docs: documentation build src/js/** -f html -o docs/lib && npm run changelog
scripts.travis: echo Running Travis Script && npm run build && npm run nyc-html && npm run coverage
scripts.buildtest: npm run build && npm run test

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
